channel.title: 57 on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in 57 on Barefoot Rob

item.title: Firefox 57
item.description:
14:58 Sunday 26 November 2017 JST I just downloaded Firefox 57 and was surprised with an insecure form detected by Lastpass when I tried to log in to Pocket with Firefox. I wonder if it’s an OAuth issue (cross site security)..
When I tried to take a screenshot of it, I discovered Firefox 57 cannot take screenshots while modal dialogs are up.
